entries.title: Judgment mod restores actor who was deleted by Sega
entries.description: The Pierre Taki Restoration Patch brings back his voice and likeness.

entries.title: Hack the police in this stylish cyberpunk visual novel
entries.description: Solace State puts a young hacker in the midst of a brutal crackdown.

entries.title: Getting burned at the stake is just the start in this grimdark, witchy FPS
entries.description: Coven has you getting payback on the village that persecuted you.

entries.title: Here's a cozy little life sim about making potions
entries.description: Potion Permit has you gathering ingredients to remedy sickness in a remote village.

entries.title: Gotham Knights will take multiple playthroughs to see the whole story
entries.description: Four characters, four viewpoints on every mission.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 463 answer and hint: Sunday, September 25
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Sunday's puzzle.

entries.title: Oxenfree 2 has been delayed
entries.description: We'll have to wait until next year to tune in.
